item.title: The Grid
item.description: The electrical grid, at first mention, sounds boring. In Monopoly, you often trade away your utility cards in favor of more sexy assets (Boardwalk & Park Place).

item.title: Documentaries
item.description: I love documentaries. Here are a few. The Game Changers Game Changers focuses on the benefits of plant-based diets through the lense of professional atheletes. While the film touches on the environmental impact and animal cruelity side of meat production, it centers on the health implications of mass-consumption of animal protein.

item.title: Time Travel Movies
item.description: I love stories that mess with time. Seeing characters interact over vastly different time periods is pure movie magic. I initially wrote captions for each of these, but found them more powerful without.

item.title: A New Year is Here
item.description: Welcome to my freshly minted website. This post covers highlights from the past year as well as my goal-setting strategem going in to 2020. Highlights of 2019 2019 - The Best We Could Do Last year I wrote a personal review of the year prior, with set goals going into 2019ยน.
